ModMetaData.name: Crackhead King Trader
ModMetaData.author: Fufulog
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an Orbital Trader called the Crackhead King. Sells drugs, strange wares and burritos. AKA the loot table of your local crackhead king if he were a DND mob.
Adds a large amount of drugs: 5 kinds of alcohol 5 kinds of tobacco products 2 edibles and vapes MANY hard drugs (some are beneficial only) Gloves, Shoes and Socks 3 kinds of smeltable scraps Some rare items and buildings sold only by the trader Requires VFE core for apparell hediffs.
Items found are based entirely on this list and meme: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56boQOgekas
